                else InInventory SamsaraCurrentTeamIndicator, 1 { DrawString CMPSDUKE, Blue, "BLUE", 10, 158; }
            }
        }

        InInventory ExpandedHud
        {

    {

                    InInventory Backpack { DrawNumber 4, RTCWNUMB, Yellow, Ammo Clip, Alignment(Center), DrawShadow(3, 3), 294, 176, Red, 40, RTCWGray, 161; }
                    else { DrawNumber 4, RTCWNUMB, Yellow, Ammo Clip, Alignment(Center), DrawShadow(3, 3), 294, 176, Red, 20, RTCWGray, 81; }
                }
                else { DrawNumber 4, RTCWNUMB, Yellow, Ammo1, Alignment(Center), DrawShadow(3, 3), 294, 171, Red, 0, RTCWGray, 4; }
            } else InInventory PistolModeOn {
                InInventory Backpack { DrawNumber 4, RTCWNUMB, Yellow, Ammo Clip, Alignment(Center), DrawShadow(3, 3), 294, 171, Red, 40, RTCWGray, 161; }
                else { DrawNumber 4, RTCWNUMB, Yellow, Ammo Clip, Alignment(Center), DrawShadow(3, 3), 294, 171, Red, 20, RTCWGray, 81; }
            }
        } else IsSelected RTCW_Colt {

            {
                InInventory PistolModeOn
                {
                    InInventory RTCW_ColtDualWield
                    {

                        }
                    }
                    else { DrawNumber 4, RTCWNUMB, Yellow, Ammo1, Alignment(Center), DrawShadow(3, 3), 294, 166, Red, 0, RTCWGray, 4; }

                    InInventory Backpack { DrawNumber 4, RTCWNUMB, Yellow, Ammo RTCW_AlliedAmmo1, Alignment(Center), DrawShadow(3, 3), 294, 176, Red, 20, RTCWGray, 81; }

StatusBar Fullscreen, ForceScaled
{
    InInventory SamsaraUsingNewFullscreenHUD
    {
        InInventory RottClass
        {
            // Armor
            InInventory BasicArmor, 101 { DrawNumber 4, ROTTFONT, Blue, Armor, Alignment(Left), 22, 182; }
            else { DrawNumber 4, ROTTFONT, Gold, Armor, Alignment(Left), 22, 182; }
            InInventory BasicArmor, 1
            {
                InInventory SamsaraArmorCategory, 10 { DrawImage "ARMRICO9", 10, 182; }
                else InInventory SamsaraArmorCategory, 9 { DrawImage "ARMRICO8", 10, 182; }
                else InInventory SamsaraArmorCategory, 8 { DrawImage "ARMRICO7", 10, 182; }
                else InInventory SamsaraArmorCategory, 7 { DrawImage "ARMRICO6", 10, 182; }

                    else InInventory DescentSecondaryCounter, 4 { DrawImage "STY2NUM4", 156, 10; }
                } else { // Slot 4A
                    InInventory DescentPrimaryCounter, 5 {}
                    else InInventory DescentPrimaryCounter, 4 { DrawImage "STY2NUM4", 156, 10; }
                }

                } else { // Slot 5A

                    else InInventory DescentPrimaryCounter, 5 { DrawImage "STY2NUM5", 166, 10; }

                                DrawBar "HAMBAR", "HEMPTY", Ammo DukePistolDumDumReload, Horizontal, Reverse, 251, 193;
                                DrawNumber 4, INDEXFONT, White, Ammo DukePistolDumDumReload, 270, 186;
                            } else {
                                InInventory PistolModeOn
                                {
                                    DrawImage "HUDBAR", 250, 192;
                                    DrawBar "HAMBAR", "HEMPTY", Ammo Duke64DumDums, Horizontal, Reverse, 251, 193;
                                    DrawNumber 4, INDEXFONT, White, Ammo Duke64DumDums, 270, 186;
                                } else {
                                    DrawImage "HUDBAR", 250, 180;
                                    DrawBar "HAMBAR", "HEMPTY", Ammo Duke64DumDums, Horizontal, Reverse, 251, 181;
                                    DrawNumber 4, INDEXFONT, White, Ammo Duke64DumDums, 298, 185;
                                }
                            }

                            InInventory SamsaraReloadMode, 1
                            {
                                InInventory PistolModeOn { DrawNumber 4, INDEXFONT, Orange, Ammo Duke64DumDums, 298, 174; }
                                else { DrawNumber 4, INDEXFONT, Orange, Ammo Duke64DumDums, 273, 174; }
                            }

                            InInventory PistolModeOn { DrawImage "AMSMK0", 228, 192, Center; }
                            else { DrawImage "AMSMK0", 238, 185, Center; }
                        } else { // Original/Life's A Beach
                            InInventory SamsaraReloadMode, 1
                            {
                                DrawImage "HUDBAR", 250, 180;
                                DrawBar "HAMBAR", "HEMPTY", Ammo1, Horizontal, Reverse, 251, 181;
                                DrawNumber 4, INDEXFONT, White, Ammo1, 298, 185;
                            }
